text: wmn yat rabah mwmnana bih qad eamil al'aemal alsalht falah almanazil alealiat fi janaat al'iqamt aldaymt, tajri min taht ashjarha al'anhar maakithin fiha abdana, wdhlk alnaeim almuqim thawab min allah liman thhar nafsih min aldns walkhbth walshrk, waeabd allah wahdah fataeh wajtnb measyh, walaqi rabih la yushrik bebadth ahdana min khlqh
